site.headline: Workshop.earth
site.intro: Tools to visualize seismology concepts and data.

features.name: 3D Event Engine

thumb.alt: Image thumbnail of 3D events engine app

features.blurb: On July 5th 2019 a magnitude 7.1 earthquake struck Ridgecrest, CA. Effects were felt for miles and aftershocks were numerous. It's scale is visualized here.
features.disc: Currently the engine is hard-coded with this specific dataset.
